bug.author: leezu
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html</denchmark-link> links to <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/mxnet.gluon.Trainer.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/mxnet.gluon.Trainer.html</denchmark-link> instead of the correct <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/trainer.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/trainer.html</denchmark-link>
Same for many other API pages. Therefore google still prefers linking to the beta.mxnet.io page.

comments.comment: Verified, these Python API links are fixed. Issue can be closed. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/leezu>@leezu</denchmark-link>
